title: Client Care Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Volunteer Behavioral Health Care System (Chattanooga, TN) in Feb 2023
Interview Descriptions: L1st interview in person with the director, 2nd interview was virtual with another staff member. Questions were asked in Both interviews. A description of yhe job and the duties were discussed along with benefits.

title: Child Development Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Volunteer Behavioral Health Care System
Interview Descriptions: Easy and laid back interview. They asked me fairly standard questions (strengths and weaknesses, goals, etc). Everyone was friendly and encouraging. I left having a strong impression that I had the position.

title: Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Volunteer Behavioral Health Care System (Nashville, TN) in Feb 2022
Interview Descriptions: The Hiring process was long but simple. Background information took over a month to come back. Onboarding was easy and system was user friendly. The supervisors were friendly and communicated the job role well.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Care Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Volunteer Behavioral Health Care System (Chattanooga, TN) in Jun 2018
Interview Descriptions: Panel interview with questions about your schedule and what would make you a good fit for their team. The atmosphere was very relaxed and I felt comfortable in the room.
Interview Questions: What makes you feel you are able to do this job

title: Care Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Volunteer Behavioral Health Care System in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: The interview process is very relaxing and the position is explained thoroughly. You are able to ask questions without feeling intimidated and receive answers that you are needing. A great experience for those who aren’t the best at interviewing.
Interview Questions: What can you bring to the position?
